entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
